Keywords: Armor , Future , Horsemen , Past , Ruler , X-Men
Real Name: En Sabah Nur
Special Powers
RALLY (5): Opposing Attack Rolls. Remove Apocalypse's RALLY die to choose a friendly character that shares a keyword. The chosen character can use Blades/Claws/Fangs this turn. (RALLY: Once per roll for each die in a finalized attack roll and for all characters with a matching RALLY die and trait color printed under their trait star, after resolutions you may choose a friendly character to gain a matching RALLY die. RALLY trait colors specify which attack type they can gain RALLY dies from. BLUE = Friendly Attack Rolls. RED = Opposing Attack Rolls. GREEN = All Attack Rolls.)
THE STRONG SURVIVE: Adjacent friendly characters, or friendly characters with the X-Men or Horsemen keyword, can use Steal Energy.
I PLANNED FOR THIS VERY OPPORTUNITY: Invulnerability, Mastermind.
THE END IS COMING...HELP ME SAVE THIS WORLD: Leadership, Outwit.
Figure Errata
OLD: Adjacent friendly characters or characters with the X-Men or Horsemen keyword can use Steal Energy.

Comments
October 2, 2022
tidge
IMO the 10-point XoS Sword Objects even without the upcoming (2023?) "auto equip" rules, go a long way towards addressing the elements of the raw dial that I don't particularly like: Incapacitate and natural 3-damage on a 125-point figure. At a net point cost of 135, this figure feels like a good fit for the XoS era. It's a solid "budget" option for the character, both in terms of point cost and $$$. It really won't matter which sword is used, as the BCF is the most important element... however, if you want to leverage his ability to stay alive via aggression (and Mastermind fodder), the Light of Galador seems like a good fit.

reanimationguy
I wasn’t too interested in this Apocalypse before the errata, but now that only friendlies are healing, I might need to pick one up.
August 20, 2021
tidge
This dial (and keyword selection) looks as if it was assembled from leftover ideas that weren't used on HoX versions of the character. The granting of Steal Energy (to friends and foes) is the most interesting feature of the dial. I don't really picture Apocalypse as a "run and gun" character.
August 12, 2021
Goop
Never falls below 11atk, high def values. high dmg values. Hes kind of uninteresting but he is a heavy hitter that will be tough to bring down with all the reducers and mastermind. Definitely to be played on a full melee team to take advantage of steal energy.
